attributes.review: THIS APP TOOK ABOUT 7 HOURS TO DOWNLOAD!!!!!!!  asked for my ethnicity/nationality and i said i was chicana, told me to leave this country and go back to mexico! I HAVE NEVER FELT SO OFFENDED BY A APP FROM A PERSON THAT CLAIMS TO MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND GETTING THIS APP BECAUSE IT TAKES SO LONG TO DOWNLOAD, AND IS RACIST !!!!! when i put my information to make a account my phone turned off and when it turned back on it glitched. all my stuff were hacked!!!! so much for a “trustworthy” app i thought could help me. CLEARLY IT DID NOT.!!!! I do NOT recommended getting this app horrible. I WOULD RECOMMEND GETTING TIK TOK OVER THIS HACKING APP THAT TAKES HOURS TO DOWNLOAD AND IS EXTREMELY RACIST TO PEOPLE THAT ARE NOT WHITE STRAIGHT MALE!!! my friend that is (bi) downloaded this app thinking it was a good app to keep being updated with information but she signed up and answered a survey that is MANDATORY she put her sexuality (bisexual) and after that she’s been getting so many horrible threats, on all her social media from people that also support this president. saying “it’s just a fase” “you are going to burn in hell” “you should be dead” “you are a embarrassment” and ect. if you wanna be kept updated with things i would still recommend getting tik tok !!!!! it helps so much and the community that “loves❤️” bunker boy is amazing !! AS I SAID DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP AND DO YOUR HORRIBLE REVIEWS WITH THIS APP! GET THIS APP BANNED AND NOT TIK TOK !👁👄👁
